title: Type Visibility & Assignment Fixes
description: Fix TS2322 type assignment errors and TS2345 argument type mismatches. These are medium-severity issues affecting type safety.

tasks.description: Fix type assignment in create.ts - Review factory function signature mismatch at line 368 and adjust type annotations or signatures to match expected types
Audit and fix TS2322 errors in expression nodes - Review all type assignment errors in src/expression/node/ directory and apply proper type annotations or safe type assertions
Fix TS2322 errors in function implementations - Review and fix type assignments in src/function/ directory files with type mismatches
Fix TS2345 argument type mismatches - Review 6 occurrences where function arguments don't match parameter types and apply correct type annotations
Fix TS2564 property initialization errors - Add proper initialization in constructors or use definite assignment assertion for 3 occurrences

acceptanceCriteria: npm run compile:ts error count significantly reduced
